books: Our Class is a Family by Shannon Olsen
Stella Brings the Family by Miriam Schiller
The Relatives Came by Cynthia Rylant
letters_numbers: Tracing letter U with wet sponge and paper towel
activities: Create family collage from magazine images
Count family members and compare sizes
sensory: Cuts, doll house people, shovels in sensory table
raw_excerpt: CHICAGO CONTEMPORARY PRESCHOOL Classroom: Pre-K Week of: September 8-12 Weekly Theme: We Are Family Circle Time books include Families, Families, Our Class is a Family, Stella Brings the Family, and The Relatives Came. Activities include crafts, playdough, painting, and sorting. Sensory table has cuts, doll house people, and shovels.
